mapper.select: SELECT `id`, if(`grpno` = 0, `id`, `grpno`) as `grpno`, `grpord`, `depth`, `title`, `writer`, `reg_date`, `viewcount` FROM `db_stock`.`tb_board_list` ORDER BY `grpno` DESC, `grpord` ASC LIMIT 0, 10;
mapper.insert:
